header.name: Santiago Ivan Lizarazo Mikly
header.passion: I am an Electronic and Software Engineer from Costa Rica.
header.origin: I am proficient in English and Spanish.
header.learning-goal: My goal is to keep learning to provide the best service in this area.
header.certifications-projects: I am a Software Engineer with over 3 years of experience and have a degree in Electronic Engineering. I have earned multiple software certifications and completed various projects to demonstrate my skills.
header.current-studies: I am currently expanding my knowledge in machine learning and delving deeper into neural networks.

miscellaneous.passionPhrase: My passion is to design perfect pages with excellent functionality and user experience

projects.journal: A Journal with CRUD notes and image upload was created. Firebase was used for the back-end and React with Redux, Material UI, CSS, HTML5 and JavaScript for the Front-End. Additional technologies: Babel and Jest for testing
projects.pets: In this project, a MERN Pet Adoption page was built. NodeJS was used for the back-end and React with Context, CSS, BootStrap, HTML5, and JavaScript for the Front-End.
projects.calendar: This project is a MERN Calendar with CRUD events. NodeJS was used for the back-end and React with Redux, CSS, BootStrap, HTML5, and JavaScript for the Front-End. Additional technologies: Babel and Jest for testing
projects.maryMikly: A page was created for the Mary Mikly company. React, CSS, TailWindCSS, HTML5, JavaScript were used
projects.hangman: A Hangman game was built on the web. React, CSS, HTML5, JavaScript were used
projects.veterinary: A MERN page for veterinarians with CRUD appointments was created. NodeJS was used for the back-end and React with Context, CSS, TailWindCSS, HTML5, and JavaScript for the Front-End. Additional technologies: Cypress for testing
projects.festival: This page was created for a music festival. HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, SASS were used
projects.cripto: This project was based on a cryptocurrency quote page with an API for the quote. HTML5, JavaScript, CSS were used
projects.heroes: A Marvel/DC Heroes SPA page was created. HTML5, React, JavaScript, CSS were used. Additional technologies: Babel and Jest for testing
projects.footballfever: I created FootballFever, a captivating web page built with React using TypeScript and TailwindCSS. With my passion for football, I crafted an immersive user experience, incorporating interactive components and seamless navigation. The result is a visually appealing and responsive site dedicated to celebrating the love of the game.
